Client Portal

Seamlessly communicate with your clients, automate your reporting, and keep track of all your important tasks

Explore the Client Portal
Streamline Your Agency Work

Client Portal, which is part of Semrush’s CRM, allows you to personalize and automate contact between you and your clients

Make Communication Simple and Clear
Give your clients a dedicated and secure portal with 24/7 access
Reduce back-and-forth messaging — get project approval quicker
Clearly and succinctly communicate with your clients when you need to
Try It Free
Automate and Customize Your Reporting
Select which reports your want your client to receive with a few clicks
Skip time manually crunching numbers — the reports you select update to the dashboard automatically
Create white-label reports that give each client a customized experience
Try It Free

Embed Client Portals on Your Agency Website

Integrate client portals on your website's subdomain to ensure a seamless experience, increase client loyalty and satisfaction, and boost your branding presence.




Provide secure and personalized portals as your own custom solution with no code required.

Create task workflows in the Semrush CRM and share them through Client Portal

Get ease approvals from your clients
